SEARCH
Package graph

Class AdjacencyMatrixGraph

java.lang.Object
graph.AdjacencyMatrixGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class AdjacencyMatrixGraph extends Object implements Graph
AdjacencyMatrixGraph represents a directed graph using an adjacency matrix. Each vertex is represented by a row/column in the matrix, and edges are represented by non-zero values in the matrix.

  • Constructor Summary

    AdjacencyMatrixGraph()
    Constructs an empty graph with an initial capacity for vertices.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdjacencyMatrixGraph

      public AdjacencyMatrixGraph()
      Constructs an empty graph with an initial capacity for vertices. The initial capacity is set to 16 vertices.

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Description copied from interface: Graph
